function centroidtest, input a=setbetterthresh(input) b=quickmask(input,a[0].thresh) input[b.xpos - !param.crop_box:b.xpos + !param.crop_box,$ b.ypos - !param.crop_box:b.ypos + !param.crop_box] =0 c=quickmask(input,a[1].thresh) input[c.xpos - !param.crop_box:c.xpos + !param.crop_box,$ c.ypos - !param.crop_box:c.ypos + !param.crop_box] =0 d=quickmask(input,a[2].thresh) return,{reg1:b,reg2:c,reg3:d} end
